=== About me ===

* Linux user since ~2001
* Spanish translator of GNOME project

=== Interests ===

* Programming in general
* Translating ubuntu
* Ubuntu based distros. I'm a main developer of "Augustux":http://www.augustux.org/

=== My Ubuntu contributions ===

Hoary packages repository::
<pre>
deb-src http://www.amedias.org/~koke/debian hoary
</pre>
Note that most of packages are source only uploads awaiting to be added to Ubuntu archive. Some of them are also built for powerpc.

* My UniversePackageWithoutDesktopFile packages: toppler, eric, wings3d, f-spot
* My UniversePythonTransitionTODO packages: cheetah, libhid, omniorb4, papaya, pytone, synopsis, xmldiff, zsi
* My UniverseUnmetDeps packages: fsviewer, ghemical, wdm
* Spanish translation of update-manager, update-notifier, gnome-app-install and updates for another like synaptic or system-tools-backends
* <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.ubuntu.com/show_bug.cgi?id=6578|#6578: Details should be hidden when no updates are available]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-devel/2005-February/004545.html|evolution-sharp package]]</nowiki>
